name: jsbeat
description: A light, Javascript based, Beat to collect data for the Open Collector

scripts.build_XXX: webpack ; echo -e "" ; mv dist jsBeat-1.1.2 ; tar cfvz jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz jsBeat-1.1.2/* ; echo -e "" ; mv jsBeat-1.1.2 dist ; sha256sum jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz > jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz.sha256 ; cat jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz.sha256 ; echo -e ""
scripts.build: webpack ; echo -e "" ; cd dist ; mv jsBeat jsBeat-1.1.2 ; tar cfvz jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz jsBeat-1.1.2/* ; echo -e "" ; mv jsBeat-1.1.2 jsBeat ; sha256sum jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz > jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz.sha256 ; cat jsBeat-1.1.2.tgz.sha256 ; echo -e "" ; cd ..

author: Tony Masse
